{{s.id}} {{s.name}} {{s.email}} {{s.phone}} {{s.name}} DETAIlS UPDATE DELETE
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { UsersService } from 'src/app/services/users.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-users', templateUrl: './users.component.html', styles: [ ] }) export class UsersComponent implements OnInit { constructor( public UService:UsersService){} users:any; ngOnInit(): void { this.UService.GetAllUsers().subscribe({ next:(data)=>{ console.log(data) this.users = data; }, error:(err)=>{console.log(err)} }) } }
